msg: Fixed NPE in CrawlingWorker; improved exception handling and logging in the HTTP transport

msg: HTTP transport improvements: DoS prevention (dealing with infinite header lines, infinite number of HTTP headers, infinite content body); more lenient HTTP message parser

msg: testLocalhost should be independent of the local hosts file.
